Gapminder latest-year snapshot by country

gm_summary.Rd

One row per country for the most recent year in gm_panel (typically 2007). Useful for bubble plots and ranked tables.

Usage

data(gm_summary)

Format

A data frame with columns:

country

Country (character).

continent

Continent (character).

year

Latest year present (integer, usually 2007).

lifeExp

Life expectancy at birth (numeric, years).

gdpPercap

GDP per capita (numeric, international \$).

pop_mill

Population in millions (numeric).

Source

Derived from gm_panel (Gapminder; CC BY 3.0).

Details

Derived from gm_panel by filtering to max(year) and optionally transforming population to millions for display.

Examples

# Top 10 countries by population (latest year)
if (exists("gm_summary")) {
  head(gm_summary[order(-gm_summary$pop_mill), ], 10)
}
#> # A tibble: 10 × 6
#>    country       continent  year lifeExp gdpPercap pop_mill
#>    <fct>         <fct>     <int>   <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl>
#>  1 China         Asia       2007    73.0     4959.    1319.
#>  2 India         Asia       2007    64.7     2452.    1110.
#>  3 United States Americas   2007    78.2    42952.     301.
#>  4 Indonesia     Asia       2007    70.6     3541.     224.
#>  5 Brazil        Americas   2007    72.4     9066.     190.
#>  6 Pakistan      Asia       2007    65.5     2606.     169.
#>  7 Bangladesh    Asia       2007    64.1     1391.     150.
#>  8 Nigeria       Africa     2007    46.9     2014.     135.
#>  9 Japan         Asia       2007    82.6    31656.     127.
#> 10 Mexico        Americas   2007    76.2    11978.     109.
